short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides selected UI elements on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The simplest way to hide noisy elements on a web page 

🚀 How to play:
  ⭐️ Click on “Hide UI” icon for activating
  ⭐️ Highlight a target element
  ⭐️ Press click
  ⭐️ Turn the extension off

🚀 Reload
  ⭐️ If you hide accidentally something important - just reload the page to restore the original view


Completely free and with no ads

Made by Roman Kovalskyi  🇺🇦
